channel.title: D3 on Jake Klingler - Software Developer
channel.description: Recent content in D3 on Jake Klingler - Software Developer

item.title: Inpatient Dashboard Prototype
item.description: Prototyped a next-generation tool for doctors to review medical data. The prototype involved heavy end-user customization and data visualization, and required working closely with UX Designers and developing multiple iterations of the design based on user testing.

item.title: Software Developer
item.description: Added functionality to large healthcare software and prototyped a next-generation tool to review medical data.
